DataElement.preferredDefinition: A grouping of Decay Correction (0054,1102) in a real-world event to which images in this Image Series were decay corrected. If decay correction is applied, all images in the Series shall be decay corrected to the same time.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A technique for measuring the deteriotion of gamma radiation during the creation of composite instances of the same Modality, created by the same Equipment, with the same Frame of Reference for use in correcting results.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:A number of things or events standing or succeeding in order, and connected by a like relation. (from On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
A group or succession of objects, substances, or events arranged in regular order in space or time, connected by a like relation, or forming a kind of chain.

Property.preferredDefinition: A gradual deterioration or decline to an inferior state.:The act of offering an improvement to replace a mistake; setting right; something substituted for an error.

Concepts.definition: A gradual deterioration or decline to an inferior state.
The act of offering an improvement to replace a mistake; setting right; something substituted for an error.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/31/11 retired CDE 2975862/DEC 2975826 to create more generic CDE using Image Series OC (OC Public ID: 2436196v1.0). 8/28/10  Released for CRF documentation.  1/4/2010 Created for Image SUV IMGCRF module.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic._A gradual deterioration or decline to an inferior state._The act of offering an improvement to replace a mistake; setting right; something substituted for an error._Category; used informally to mean a class of things.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: radiopharmaceutical administration time, Radiopharmaceutical Start Time (0018,1072)
No person or thing, nobody, not any.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

A gradual deterioration or decline to an inferior state.
The act of offering an improvement to replace a mistake; setting right; something substituted for an error.
A grouping of items based on some commonality or by user defined characteristics.

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/10  Released for use in Image SUV Calc module.  1/3/2010 created for IMGCRF SUV CRF module.

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 5/31/11 - new CDE created to support both PET and non-PET images that are decay corrected.  Needed to support CCR SPECT/CT study.   8/29/10  Released for Image SUV Calculation Module.  4/27/10 add to CRF CSI.  1/4/2010 - created for IMGCRF Image SUV module.
